nodes.text: Katei Elinari Panteer was a Human female Alderaanian who was Princess of House Panteer and a survivor of the family following the death of Queen Silara Panteer during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Katei was considered the closest to an heir to the queen following the actions of self-declared king, Bouris Ulgo.

In the Cold War, the surviving Panteers were discovered to be hiding within the mountains and Katei Panteer was in contact with Galactic Republic Commander Bradel. During this time, she tasked a traveling hero of the Republic with eliminating Bouris Ulgo, though Bradel urged for the usurper to be apprehended for a trial.
Katei appears in the mission "Usurper" for Republic classes in the 2011 BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic. She is the missions starting point.
